messages.subject: Re:historical fiction
messages.msgSnippet: Yes, I loved these books.  My sister recommended them -- and finally sent me one.  They re a little more risque than I normally read, but I got sucked in, too.
messages.messageBody:
Yes, I loved these books. My sister recommended them -- and finally sent me one. They're a little more risque than I normally read, but I got sucked in, too.

I've heard there's at least a 7th one coming soon, and maybe an 8th?

Sylvia


---------------------------------
You rock. That's why Blockbuster's offering you one month of Blockbuster Total Access, No Cost.

messages.subject: historical fiction
messages.msgSnippet: I LOVE Diana Gabaldon s book series Outlander. There are 6 or 7 so far. the first book is Outlander and it sucked me in so fast I stayed up all night long to
messages.messageBody:
I LOVE Diana Gabaldon's book series Outlander. There are 6 or 7 so far. the first book is "Outlander" and it sucked me in so fast I stayed up all night long to finish it (this was many years ago, before kids!)

Its historical fiction, but really defies genre, its fiction, litearature, romance, time travel.....mystery....and funny, too.

Nancy
baby sleeping on me so its hard to type

http://happychildhood.homeschooljournal.net
